009package ImageJ_Demos;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
014import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
015
016/**
017 * This plugin demonstrates how to create and display a 
018 * new byte image (to show the histogram of the input image).
019 */
020public class Create_New_Byte_Image implements PlugInFilter {
021        
022        ImagePlus im;
023
024        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
025                this.im = im;
026                return DOES_8G + NO_CHANGES;
027        }
028
029        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
030                // obtain the histogram of ip:
031                int[] hist = ip.getHistogram();
032                int K = hist.length;
033                
034                // create the histogram image:
035                ImageProcessor histIp = new ByteProcessor(K, 100);
036                histIp.setValue(255);   // white = 255
037                histIp.fill();
038
039                // draw the histogram values as black bars in histIp here, 
040                // for example, using histIp.putpixel(u, v, 0)
041                // ...
042                
043                // compose a nice title:
044                String imTitle = im.getShortTitle();
045                String histTitle = "Histogram of " + imTitle;
046                
047                // display the histogram image:
048                ImagePlus histIm = new ImagePlus(histTitle, histIp);
049                histIm.show(); 
050        }
051}
